Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People across Australia are closely following and discussing the latest trending news topics as debates related to government welfare and financial support ramp up. With ongoing concerns around levels of financial stress and ongoing challenges posed by the COVID-19 pandemic there are calls for the Federal Government to increase JobSeeker payments by thousands of dollars. Meanwhile many are alarmed by the stark increase in the number of people who are struggling to afford basic necessities like medicine and electricity. Additionally there have been intense rescue efforts in Western Australia to save 11 stranded fishermen who were without food and water for several days. Despite the uncertainty of recent interest rate decisions there is some hope for the economy as positive movements in property and commodity markets suggest a broader economic recovery.
